title: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president

title: South Africa and Israel expel each other's envoys in diplomatic row

content: The Milano-Cortina Winter Olympics open on Monday, but rapper Ghali's inclusion draws criticism in his native Italy.

title: Judge blocks US gov’t move to end deportation protections for Ethiopians
